unnormalised: Hey folks, ever feel like you're breathing in something a little...off? Well, air quality's been making headlines again. Delhi, especially around Diwali, saw PM2.5 levels spike, reminding us of that smoggy scene from 'Delhi 6'!
normalised: Hey folks, ever feel like you're breathing in something a little off? Well, air quality's been making headlines again. Delhi, especially around Diwali, saw P M two point five levels spike, reminding us of that smoggy scene from 'Delhi six'!

unnormalised: The Central Pollution Control Board (CPCB) reported that several cities, including Kanpur and Patna, are struggling to maintain "good" air quality levels. It's a recurring problem, especially during the winter months when the winds die down.
normalised: The Central Pollution Control Board (C P C B) reported that several cities, including Kanpur and Patna, are struggling to maintain "good" air quality levels. It's a recurring problem, especially during the winter months when the winds die down.

unnormalised: Experts at IIT-Kanpur are working on new air purification technologies, but it's a long game. Stubble burning in Punjab and Haryana adds to the woes, sending pollutants drifting towards the Indo-Gangetic plain.
normalised: Experts at I I T-Kanpur are working on new air purification technologies, but it's a long game. Stubble burning in Punjab and Haryana adds to the woes, sending pollutants drifting towards the Indo-Gangetic plain.

unnormalised: The government's been promoting the use of electric vehicles and cleaner fuels, but more needs to be done. Think carpooling, planting trees, and maybe skipping those firecrackers next Diwali? After all, who wants to live in a real-life 'Delhi 6' scene? Every breath counts!
normalised: The government's been promoting the use of electric vehicles and cleaner fuels, but more needs to be done. Think carpooling, planting trees, and maybe skipping those firecrackers next Diwali? After all, who wants to live in a real-life 'Delhi six' scene? Every breath counts!
